patthana21.4:4.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.4:5.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetu sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.4:6.1: Nahetuṃ naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.4:6.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
